settings.signedOutAllDevices: Signed out of all devices successfully

dashboard.welcome: Welcome to your HeyGen dashboard. Monitor your usage and recent activity.
dashboard.welcomeSuffix: dashboard. Monitor your usage and recent activity.

list.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this video?

avatars.title: Avatars
avatars.subtitle: Create and manage your AI avatars
avatars.description: Generate and customize avatars for your videos

photoAvatars.title: AI Photo Avatars
photoAvatars.description: Create realistic AI-generated photo avatars using Topmaj API
photoAvatars.details: Generate customized AI avatars with attributes like age, gender, ethnicity, and appearance. These avatars can be used in your videos to create engaging content.

digitalHumans.title: Coming Soon: Digital Humans
digitalHumans.description: Create fully animated digital human avatars
digitalHumans.details: We're working on bringing digital human avatars to our platform. Stay tuned for updates!

mediaGeneration.title: Media Generation
mediaGeneration.description: Generate videos from images with AI

errors.failedToLoad: Failed to load generations. Please try again.

errors.failedToDownload: Failed to download video. Please try again.

textToImage.title: Text to Image
textToImage.promptPlaceholder: Enter a detailed description of the image you want to generate...
textToImage.noImageYet: No image generated yet. Enter a prompt and click "Generate Image".

textToVideo.title: Text to Video
textToVideo.promptPlaceholder: Enter a detailed description of the video you want to generate...
textToVideo.noVideoYet: No video generated yet. Enter a prompt and click "Generate Video".

imageToImage.title: Image to Image
imageToImage.promptPlaceholder: Describe how you want to transform the image...
imageToImage.noImageTransformedYet: No image transformed yet. Upload an image, enter a prompt, and click "Transform Image".

imageToVideo.title: Image to Video
imageToVideo.description: Turn still images into dynamic videos
imageToVideo.promptPlaceholder: Describe how you want the image to be animated...
imageToVideo.noVideoAnimatedYet: No video animated yet. Upload an image, enter a prompt, and click "Animate Image".

videoTranslations.title: Video Translations
videoTranslations.description: Translate your videos into multiple languages
videoTranslations.createDescription: Translate your videos into different languages using HeyGen's AI technology.
videoTranslations.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop your video file here or click to browse
videoTranslations.enterVideoUrlDescription: Enter the URL of the video you want to translate
videoTranslations.createFirstTranslation: Create your first video translation to see it here

happyScribeInfo.title: Subtitle Information
happyScribeInfo.description: Subtitles are generated using HappyScribe's transcription service

errors.selectFile: Please select a file to upload
errors.provideVideoUrl: Please upload a video or provide a video URL
errors.apiKeyNoAccess: Your API key doesn't have access to the Video Translation feature. This feature requires a Scale or Enterprise tier subscription.
errors.failedToCreate: Failed to create translation. Please try again.
errors.failedToDelete: Failed to delete translation. Please try again.
errors.runMigration: Please run the SQL migration script to create the video_translations table.

warnings.featureRequiresSubscription: The Video Translation feature requires a Scale or Enterprise tier HeyGen API subscription. You can still use the interface, but actual translations may not work.

success.translationReady: Your video translation is ready to view

advancedTextToVideo.description: Generate high-quality videos using Google Veo AI technology

advancedTextToVideo.yourGenerationsDescription: Manage your Google Veo video generations
advancedTextToVideo.createFirstVideo: Create your first AI-generated video using Google Veo

success.generationStartedDescription: Your video is being generated. This may take several minutes.
success.generationCompleteDescription: Your video is ready to view and download

credits.title: Credits
credits.subtitle: Manage your credits and subscription
credits.description: Manage your credits and subscription plans
credits.subscribeToPlan: Subscribe to a plan to get started
credits.creditUsageDescription: Credits are consumed when generating videos, creating avatars, or using other features. Different features may consume different amounts of credits.
credits.noPackagesFound: No credit packages found. Purchase credits to get started.
credits.manualCreditDescription: Use this option if Stripe checkout is unavailable
credits.currentSubscriptionDescription: You are currently subscribed to the {planName} plan. Your subscription will {renewalStatus}.
credits.statementDownloadDescription: This feature would download a statement of your transactions in a real application.
credits.paymentSuccessfulDescription: Your payment was processed successfully. Credits have been added to your account.
credits.paymentCanceledDescription: Your payment was canceled. No charges were made.
credits.failedToLoadCredits: Failed to load credits data. Please try again.
